name: A Night Overland
description:
Traveling overland by battery powered truck. Charge during the day; travel during the night. How long will it take you to find Lux Lake?

Game submission for the Lux Jam 01

WASD or ARROW KEYS to move
TAB to turn on high-beam headlights
SPACEBAR to interact
MOUSE to do mouse things

Notes:
Camping is broken... should reset several values and open a new journal entry.
When you reach the lake you should get a win screen...
Too many last second changes caused a few other issues.
Sorry :(
